LanguageData.VFEM2_DrankWine_Awful.stages.0.label: выпито ужасное вино
LanguageData.VFEM2_DrankWine_Awful.stages.0.descripti: I can't believe I just drank that. The sour taste still lingers, and my stomach feels unsettled. What was that supposed to be, vinegar?
LanguageData.VFEM2_DrankWine_Poor.stages.0.label: выпито плохое вино
LanguageData.VFEM2_DrankWine_Poor.stages.0.descriptio: Not the best I’ve had. It’s bitter and barely drinkable. I guess it'll do if nothing else is around, but I can feel a headache coming on already.
LanguageData.VFEM2_DrankWine_Normal.stages.0.label: drank wine
LanguageData.VFEM2_DrankWine_Normal.stages.0.descript: This is passable. It doesn’t excite the senses, but it’s smooth enough to enjoy.
LanguageData.VFEM2_DrankWine_Good.stages.0.label: выпито хорошее вино
LanguageData.VFEM2_DrankWine_Good.stages.0.descriptio: Ah, this wine is quite pleasant. The flavors blend nicely, and I can feel a comfortable buzz setting in.
LanguageData.VFEM2_DrankWine_Excellent.stages.0.label: выпито отличное вино
LanguageData.VFEM2_DrankWine_Excellent.stages.0.descr: Now this is what wine is supposed to taste like! Each sip is a delight. I feel my mind clearing, and everything seems just a little more vibrant.
LanguageData.VFEM2_DrankWine_Masterwork.stages.0.desc: Absolutely exquisite. The depth of flavor is extraordinary, and I can feel my body relaxing, as if every worry is drifting away.
LanguageData.VFEM2_DrankWine_Legendary.stages.0.label: выпито легендарное вино
LanguageData.VFEM2_DrankWine_Legendary.stages.0.descr: I've never tasted anything like this before. It’s as though the very essence of joy has been captured in liquid form.
LanguageData.VFEM2_TorturerDraught.stages.0.label: twisting pain
LanguageData.VFEM2_TorturerDraught.stages.0.descripti: This wicked concoction set my insides on fire! It hurts all over!
